sentences.en: He was a country boy who had joined the army out of a sense of patriotism and adventure.
sentences.cn: 他是个乡下小伙儿，参军是出于爱国之心和冒险精神。

sentences.en: No motives but motives of sheer patriotism?
sentences.cn: 除了纯粹的爱国主义之外别无动机 么 ?

sentences.en: On the village green, where you pick up sides and no feeling of local patriotism is involved, it is possible to play simply for the fun and exercise.
sentences.cn: 在一块乡村草坪上, 你为双方挑选队员,并不涉及地方感情问题, 只有这样才可能单纯为娱乐和锻炼而赛球.

sentences.en: One of the major themes of the novel is patriotism.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的主题之一是爱国主义.

sentences.en: Patriotism can turn into jingoism very quickly.
sentences.cn: 爱国主义可以很快转变为沙文主义。
爱国主义是政客们的惯用伎俩。

sentences.en: The company view of religion and patriotism is built into programs.
sentences.cn: 公司对宗教和爱国精神的见解,被融入到节目里.

sentences.en: The president has appealed to the Brazilian people for patriotism and community spirit.
sentences.cn: 总统已经呼吁巴西人民要有爱国情怀和集体主义精神。

sentences.en: The trade union movement was swept along by the same tidal wave of patriotism which affected the country as a whole.
sentences.cn: 这场波及全国的爱国热潮还对那场工会运动起到了推波助澜的作用。

sentences.en: They obtained money under the false pretenses of patriotism.
sentences.cn: 他们以虚伪的爱国主义为借口获得金钱.

sentences.en: They showed patriotism to their country.
sentences.cn: 他们表达了他们的爱国之心.

sentences.en: This poem is imbued with patriotism.
sentences.cn: 这首诗充满了爱国主义.

sentences.en: When it comes to talking about patriotism, he's an extremist.
sentences.cn: 一谈到爱国主义, 他就很偏激.

trans.tran_cn: 爱国主义，爱国心，爱国精神
trans.tran_en: Patriotism is love for your country and loyalty toward it
